meanings.sent1: The scungy alley was filled with trash and old newspapers.
meanings.sent2: She wore a scungy old sweater to the picnic.
meanings.sent3: The scungy dog rolled in the mud and then ran around the house.
meanings.sent4: The scungy streets whispered tales of neglect and abandonment.
meanings.sent5: The scungy room smelled of dampness and neglect.

meanings.sent1: The scungy old couch had seen better days.
meanings.sent2: The scungy building on the corner was in need of repairs.
meanings.sent3: Despite its scungy appearance, the old car still ran smoothly.
meanings.sent4: The scungy neighborhood had a charm all its own.
meanings.sent5: The scungy curtains hung limply in the dusty window.
